item.title: bsem
item.description: Flexible routines to allow structural equation modeling particular cases using ‘rstan’ integration. ‘bsem’ includes Bayesian semi Confirmatory Factor Analysis, Confirmatory Factor Analysis, and Structural Equation Model. VD Mayrink (2013) doi:10.1214/12-AOAS607

item.title: spsurv
item.description: A set of reliable routines to ease semiparametric survival regression modeling based on Bernstein polynomials. ‘spsurv’ includes proportional hazards, proportional odds and accelerated failure time frameworks for right-censored data. RV Panaro (2020) arXiv:2003.10548.
